name: Ironguard
description: Ironguard is a fast-paced roguelite shooter with procedurally generated levels and a wide array of unique weapons and items
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.3 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Shader model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 3.0GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
